UB 3UB 5 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 4/3

BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Human Vampire Berskeker Creature 3/3
2 You may activate savagery abilities of creatures you control twice each turn rather than once. Savagery — B/RB/R: Japenta “Bloodsucker” Wrat deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. (Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn and only once each turn.)
UM04 — Enteir, Wilden Actor END
RG RG 2 Legendary Creature - Human Performer Creature 1/3
2 {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Saga spells. Whenever the final chapter of a Saga you control resolves, surveil 2, then exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

III, IV — The Bloodsucker’s Secret deals 2 damage to any target. You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a Vampire card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Acronia, Fated to Villainy END
W W 1 Legendary Creature - Human Peasant Creature 1/2
2 Whenever another white creature you control dies, if Acronia, Fated to Villainy is a peasant, she becomes a 2/2 Human Warrior and gains vigilance. R/WR/WR/W: If Acronia is a Warrior, she becomes a 3/2 Human Berserker and gains first strike. W/BW/BW/BW/B: If Acronia is a Berserker, she becomes a 4/2 Human Assassin and gains lifelink. B/RB/RB/RB/RB/R: If Acronia is an Assassin, Acronia deals 5 damage to each creature and each player.
